short_summary: Prosupply of all labour, equipment, tools, material, transportation and supervision required to provide 24 hour monitoring of intrusion and fire systems, annual inspections to maintain ULC certification and on an as and when requested basis the supply of all labour, equipment, tools, material, transportation and supervision required to provide repairs, maintenance and upgrades for electronic protection/detection devices the period of the contract is from 2023-06-01 to 2028-05-31, which includes the mobilization period
